reviewText:
this cartoon is amazing, I highly recommend for young children, one of the best animations of the 80's,

much better than pokemon!

I would just like to say Thank's I thought I had lost this show forever, I have had nothing but success, since I started ordering from amazon. I will continue my search for other Golden Oldies on this site.

I grew up watching "The Little Prince" and have been trying to find it for my husband to watch as well. I've never read the book, so I can't base it on that, but I do remember being transfixed while he caught the comet and rode to other worlds. And to this day I can still remember everything about his little planet... so I guess that has to say something for it. And if anyone out there knows where to find this movie or pictures of it... please post where.

Helllooooo all you people out there who MISTAKENLY think this is suppose to be like the book!!  Doesn't anyone remember the awesome little prince cartoons from back in the 80's??  Those were the best!  I grew up watching the little prince from outer space on Nickelodeon.  I would suggest any "child of the 80's" to get this cartoon!
I seen this movie for the first time with my grandmother and fell in love with it ever since.  What an imagination!!!!
